tool.name: Generate dftb+ outputs (dftb+)
tool.command: unzip $folder && out_folder="`python ${__tool_directory__}/get_out_folder.py`" && bash ${__tool_directory__}/run.sh \$out_folder ${__tool_directory__} && zip -r out_zip.zip \$out_folder params.yaml input.cell && find \$out_folder > tree.txt
tool.help: usage: dftb+ Given some input muonated structures, generates applies DFTB+ optimization to refine them.
